attribute.name: id
attribute.description: Every component may have an unique id. Automatically created if omitted.

attribute.name: rendered
attribute.description: If false, this component will not be rendered.

attribute.name: transient
attribute.description: If true, this component will not be saved during state saving.

attribute.name: styleClass
attribute.description: Corresponds to the HTML class attribute.

attribute.name: escape
attribute.description: Indicates whether rendered markup should be escaped.
